thread.section_title: Chewy.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chewy.com | chewy.com | 2 of 320
thread.title: anniebelle

author: anniebelle
title: anniebelle
text: I work at a small, non-profit animal shelter. Many times, people come in donating unopened, new bags of food. A lot of the time, you see chewy.com on the boxes. The donors go on to explain that they 1) ordered the wrong food ro 2) they are on auto-ship and dog no longer likes that particular brand; or dog passed away 3) etc., etc. They then tell us chewy.com tells them that rather than return the unopened bag, to donate to their local animal shelter....and customer still gets a refund!! Thank you!!! Our pet food pantry is now more full than empty.
